extendedInfo.description: Fashion Hair Salon Girls Game is a fun and challenging hairstyles themed puzzler which is great for kids, girls and also adults. There are 3 fun games in this app. The first is a hair fashion jigsaw puzzle game. The second is a pictures memory game. The third is a bricks game. You can pause the game and resume later.We have also put together the best collection of hair dress up, hair cutting and hair styling videos for the aspiring hairdressers to enjoy. Download this free hair dressing game for girls and start having fun!
